section.name: Image J for Corsen plugin
section.p:
The
Corsen plugin for Image J
is available as jar file to put in imagej plugins directory.

section.name: Corsen application
section.p: The Corsen application is available as a Java Web Start.

Warning: Corsen works only with an Intel Macintosh and Mac Os X.4. With this operating system, you must install jogl to use the 3D view. This limitation is due to a
bug
in Apple Java implementation. Corsen contain a hack to bypass this bug but force user to manually install JOGL.

subsection.name: How install JOGL on Mac OS X

ul.li:
Download the lastest version of JOGL for Mac Os X (Corsen is tested with 1.1) on
JOGL website
.
Put the content of the lib folder to /Library/Java/Extensions
